articles.description: Houston Texans wide receiver Kenny Stills and free-agent defensive back Eric Reid both took shots at NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell on Saturday after he released a statement on the protests across the U.S.

articles.title: Heat's Udonis Haslem eager to help community, police work 'together' - ESPN
articles.description: Heat forward Udonis Haslem said on Sunday that he's "torn" amid the nationwide protests but that he's eager to help the community and police work together.

articles.title: Who is Jaylen Brown and what's his role in the George Floyd movement? - AS English
articles.description: Jaylen Brown is a guard from the Celtics who drove 15 hours from Boston to Atlanta to lead a peaceful protest over the death of George Floyd.
